items.content_html: A lightweight app designed to help small children (and adults) strengthen their fundamental arithmetic skills. Maths Gym generates a range of simple random maths problems for addition, subtraction, multiplication and division and provides a step-by-step solution guide (borrowing method) for each task.
items.title: tschiboka/Maths-Gym: A lightweight app designed to help small children (and adults) strengthen their fundamental arithmetic skills. Maths Gym generates a range of simple random maths problems for addition, subtraction, multiplication and division and provides a step-by-step solution guide (borrowing method) for each task.

items.content_html: Tom Select is a lightweight (~16kb gzipped) hybrid of a textbox and select box. Forked from selectize.js to provide a framework agnostic autocomplete widget with native-feeling keyboard navigation. Useful for tagging, contact lists, etc.
